name: RBF Kernel Parameter Optimization
description: Optimize SVM performance by systematically tuning the RBF kernel's gamma parameter using grid search with cross-validation to find the optimal balance between bias and variance.

name: Feature Scaling Impact Analysis
description: Investigate the impact of different feature scaling methods (StandardScaler, MinMaxScaler, RobustScaler) on SVM classification performance and determine the most effective preprocessing approach.

name: C Parameter Regularization Study
description: Analyze the effect of the regularization parameter C on SVM model performance, testing a range of values to find the optimal trade-off between training accuracy and generalization.

name: Polynomial Kernel Degree Optimization
description: Explore the use of polynomial kernels with different degrees (2, 3, 4, 5) to capture non-linear relationships in the data and compare performance against RBF kernels.

name: Feature Selection with SVM
description: Implement recursive feature elimination (RFE) with SVM to identify the most important features and evaluate whether dimensionality reduction improves classification performance.
